column5: So two comments. I am picking The vikings tonight...  And did anyone hear if Tom Brady was being chased down the road by a woman with a golf club when he got in the accident?
Vikes Lose.Nah she was throwing footballs.GO LIONS GO!!!
Go Vikes! Farve in the game tonight?
Long time Vikes fan here. Yes, Favre will be playing tonight. And the Vikes will win IF Peterson can hang onto the ball.
Long time vikes fan here too! I miss the Moss and Carter days! some exciting ball thats for sure!
Fin fan here, but always liked farve so I am rooting he tosses 300 yards tonight.
I pick the Saints and hope Favre twists his ankle!  Go Packers!
Brees with a TD...at least I managed to get him on one of my fantasy teams

Huge Near-Life-Long Packers Fan (saw home opener in 1993 @ Lambeau) and tonight was a good start en route to the division win.  Vikings D-Line and passing game looked pathetic.  (I wonder how pathetic the Green Bay offense will look on Sunday?  Maybe just 400 total yards this time).
